India vs New Zealand - Full T20I Schedule

Date Venue Time Wed, Jan 21, 2026 Nagpur, Vidarbha Cricket Association Stadium 7:00 PM IST Fri, Jan 23, 2026 Raipur, Shaheed Veer Narayan Singh International Stadium 7:00 PM IST Sun, Jan 25, 2026 Guwahati, Barsapara Cricket Stadium 7:00 PM IST Wed, Jan 28, 2026 Visakhapatnam, ACA-VDCA Cricket Stadium 7:00 PM IST Sat, Jan 31, 2026 Thiruvananthapuram, Greenfield International Stadium 7:00 PM IST

NEW DELHI: India are set to host New Zealand for a high-profile eight-match limited-overs series beginning on January 11. The tour will feature three One-Day Internationals and five Twenty20 Internationals, with matches scheduled across multiple venues in the country through January 31.The series comes at a crucial juncture, with several senior players returning to the ODI format and the T20 side looking to fine-tune combinations ahead of the ICC T20 World Cup 2026, which gets underway on February 7 in India and Sri Lanka.The ODI leg of the series is expected to draw significant attention, particularly with stalwarts Virat Kohli and Rohit Sharma making their anticipated return to the 50-over format after the South Africa series.Meanwhile, the T20Is will act as a final testing phase for Suryakumar Yadav-led Indian side as they prepare for their T20 World Cup title defence.While the BCCI has already announced the T20I squad for the New Zealand series, the ODI squad is yet to be named.The BCCI selection committee is likely to hold an online meeting around January 3 or 4 to finalise the ODI squad for the home series against New Zealand.New Zealand have already announced their T20I and ODI squads for India series.Michael Bracewell (C), Adi Ashok, Kristian Clarke, Josh Clarkson, Devon Conway, Zak Foulkes, Mitch Hay, Kyle Jamieson, Nick Kelly, Jayden Lennox, Daryl Mitchell, Henry Nicholls, Glenn Phillips, Michael Rae, Will Young: Suryakumar Yadav (C), Abhishek Sharma, Sanju Samson, Tilak Varma, Hardik Pandya, Shivam Dube, Axar Patel, Rinku Singh, Jasprit Bumrah, Harshit Rana, Arshdeep Singh, Kuldeep Yadav, Varun Chakaravarthy, Washington Sundar, Ishan Kishan: Mitchell Santner (C), Michael Bracewell, Mark Chapman, Devon Conway, Jacob Duffy, Zak Foulkes, Matt Henry, Kyle Jamieson, Bevon Jacobs, Daryl Mitchell, James Neesham, Glenn Phillips, Rachin Ravindra, Tim Robinson, Ish Sodhi
Article Summary: India set to host new zealand for a high-profile limited-overs series beginning on january 11. The tour will feature three one-day internationals and five twenty20 internationals, with matches scheduled across multiple venues in the country through january 31.

Article Title: Sidney Crosby’s lifestyle: Inside Pittsburgh Penguins captain’s luxury watch collection and personal style
Article Text:
Sidney Crosby of the Pittsburgh Penguins looks on against the Carolina Hurricanes (Credit: Getty Images)

Sidney Crosby of Pittsburgh Penguins luxury watch collection overview





The contribution of Sidney Crosby in the NHL cannot be overlooked. The 3 time Stanley Cup winner and two-time Olympic gold medalist has made history and won awards during his illustrious career. As fans cheer him up about his performance on the ice, off-ice activities display another side of the superstar; he is keen on details, style, and craftsmanship with his own luxury watches.The passion that Crosby shows towards watches is not just a hobby, but the love of design, functionality, and heritage. His well-managed time pieces, whether they are practical or a status symbol, are used during game days with the Pittsburgh Penguins or when he is being seen at a high-profile event. In the recent past, he had taken this interest further into business by investing in Swiss watchmaker Norqain, combining his interest in watches and business.ID@undefinedCaption not available.ID@undefinedCaption not available.ID@undefinedCaption not available.ID@undefinedCaption not available.ID@undefinedCaption not available.His meticulous attention to detail is also pointed out in the watch line offered by Crosby.One of his most outstanding is the Wild ONE Skeleton 42mm Turquoise, which has been selected because of its lightweight and durable design, which best fits his active lifestyle. The skeletonized face and the bright turquoise highlights reflect the vigorous presence of Crosby on the ice. The other popular model is the Freedom 60 Chrono 43mm Black, which is sporty and yet has a chronograph feature and could be used at any casual or formal event.The Norqain watches were initially revealed to the Pittsburgh Penguins captain in 2019, at the NHL All-Star Game in San Jose, when he was given a timepiece as part of a set of All-Stars. It eventually gained him appreciation over the years to the extent that he decided to invest in the Swiss brand alongside his former teammate Mark Streit. This collaboration will enable Crosby to shape design and marketing with a wider audience, as well as spread his experience and enthusiasm to a wider audience.Crosby watches are not just a fashionable accessory, but they are a demonstration of his strict attitude to life and sport. From on-ice performance to entrepreneurial activities, every timepiece in his line reflects precision, strength, and sophistication. On the one hand, the collection of Crosby provides fans of both the NHL and horology a hint of the sophisticated preferences of one of the legendary figures in the history of hockey.Together, these watches underline Crosby’s enduring legacy, leadership, and refined taste beyond the hockey rink. His watch choices mirror discipline, longevity, and quiet excellence defining Crosby’s leadership beyond hockey culture.Ultimately, Sidney Crosby’s luxury watch collection symbolizes timeless excellence, reflecting the same consistency, focus, and class that define his NHL career. This refined interest mirrors Crosby’s disciplined mindset, blending precision with understated elegance away from competition.Also Read: Net worth of Auston Matthews in 2025: Details on Vegas Golden Knights captain's earnings, salary, and contracts
Article Summary: Sidney crosby is a three-time stanley cup winner and two-time olympic gold medalist. He has invested in swiss watchmaker norqain, combining his interest in watches and business. His watch choices mirror discipline, longevity, and quiet excellence defining his leadership beyond hockey.

Article Title: Max Scherzer and Erica May-Scherzer combined net worth in 2025: A closer look inside 'Mad Max' $180 million empire
Article Text:
Max Scherzer and Erica May-Scherzer (Image Source: Getty)

How Max Scherzer turned dominance into a million-dollar lifestyle

Erica May-Scherzer’s impact off the field





Max Martin Scherzer, the star baseball player, has made a career out of intensity, toughness, and an indomitable spirit to compete. The American professional Major League Baseball player is also known as ‘Mad Max’, a pitcher who goes after hitters. That same determination is still noted in 2025, and this defines not only his presence on the pitch but also his financial position.As of 2025, Max Scherzer and his wife, Erica May-Scherzer, hold a combined net worth of approximately $180 million, making them one of the most financially secure couples in Major League Baseball.With an eight-time MLC All-Star title and three Cy Young Awards under his belt, Scherzer has consistently given elite performances into high value contracts. He started his career with the Arizona Diamondbacks and then topped it with the Detroit Tigers, Washington Nationals, and New York Mets, which are some of the most popular teams of the era.The right-handed player who is currently a free agent, mindfully entered contracts that were more focused on longevity and control. High average annual salaries, player opt-outs, and deferred payments allowed Scherzer to protect his future earnings.In 2025, he still gets money as a result of the past transactions which makes him stronger in terms of income even in the off-season. Such impactful decisions soared his career earnings to the highest point in the history of Major League Baseball.ID@undefinedCaption not available.ID@undefinedCaption not available.Scherzer did not pursue the limelight beyond the baseball game. Rather, he collaborated and worked with selective equipment and performance-oriented brands. These endorsements contribute to his wealth, but at the same time, they maintain his game-oriented image in the eyes of the public. He also invested carefully, instead of gambling on high-profile projects, Scherzer was interested in stability and long-term growth. Such a disciplined manner is a reflection of how he prepares for every start.Max’s wife, Erica May-Scherzer, is a former softball player who has experience at the collegiate administrative level, giving her an understanding of professional sports. Owing to her professional player background, Erica has been a great contributor to the success of Scherzer in his career and has helped the couple on and off the field. Although public sources do not track her personal holdings, she is the core of the family philanthropy activities. Together, the Scherzers actively promote causes related to education, health, and social justice.The combined success of Max and Erica May-Scherzer is a result of consistency, crucial planning, and focused sustainability. Moreover, the couple is known to not engage in excessive endorsement but is rather mindful of them. This strategy has made their long career in baseball a permanent financial standard as well. Having a net worth of approximately $180 million, Scherzers can be viewed as a successful case study of how financial discipline, elite performance, and long-term thinking can build an empire that will endure long after the final pitch.Also Read: Austin Riley and Anna Morgan’s combined net worth in 2025: Career earnings, salary, family life and more
Article Summary: As of 2025, max scherzer and his wife, erica may-scherzer, hold a combined net worth of approximately $180 million. The couple is known to not engage in excessive endorsement but is rather mindful of them. Together, the scherzers actively promote causes related to education, health, and social justice.

Article Title: Scottie Scheffler and Meredith Scheffler’s combined net worth: Inside the fortune of the world’s No. 1 golfer
Article Text:
Scottie Scheffler and Meredith Scheffler’s combined net worth: Inside the fortune of the world’s No. 1 golfer (Image Via Getty Images)

Scottie Scheffler’s early life and golf journey

Scottie Scheffler’s career, achievements, and earnings

Meredith Scheffler’s background and personal life

Recent updates and family life

Also Read:





Scottie Scheffler is the biggest name in golf right now, and his success has also brought attention to his wife, Meredith Scheffler. Their combined net worth is estimated at around $110-120 million. This wealth comes almost fully from Scottie’s golf winnings and endorsement deals. There are no public earnings figures available for Meredith, and she keeps her life mostly private.Scottie Scheffler, who was born on June 21, 1996, in Ridgewood, New Jersey, spent his early years in Dallas, Texas. He got into golf early on and was soon recognized in junior competitions for his skills. As a teenager, he won several Texas state titles and became one of the top junior players in the country.Scottie played college golf at the University of Texas before turning professional in 2018. His early years on tour were steady, but his career changed fully in 2022, when he won multiple PGA Tour events and became the World No. 1 golfer.Scottie has won two Masters titles (2022 and 2024) and the Players Championship. He also won Olympic gold in 2024, making him one of the most successful golfers of his generation.By early 2026, Scottie had spent over 100 weeks as World No. 1 and had earned more than $140 million in official PGA Tour prize money, according to PGA Tour records.He also earns millions each year from endorsements with brands like Nike and TaylorMade, which form the largest part of his net worth.Meredith Scheffler, born Meredith Scudder, grew up in Texas. She met Scottie while they were students at Highland Park High School, and they later became high school sweethearts. Meredith graduated from Texas A&M University and was a recruiter for TaylorMade Golf until 2024.Professionally, she is not a public figure; personally, she has no documented income. Meredith is frequently seen helping Scottie at big events and is always appreciated by him in interviews.Still in excellent form in 2025, Scotty led the money list on the PGA Tour once more after winning prominent tournaments. Following the birth of their son, Bennett, in 2024, the couple revealed in late 2025 that they were expecting their second child. Scottie and Meredith Scheffler continue to build a legacy shaped by elite success, strong family values, and long-term financial security.
Article Summary: Scottie and meredith scheffler have a combined net worth of around $110-120 million. Their wealth comes almost fully from scottie's golf winnings and endorsement deals. There are no public earnings figures available for meredith and she keeps her life mostly private.

Article Title: Is Taylor Swift attending Chiefs vs. Raiders? Here’s what we know so far
Article Text:
Taylor Swift is reportedly terriefied because of Travis Kelce.(Image via Backgrid)

What’s actually confirmed about Taylor Swift’s attendance

last opportunity to play in a regular-season finale

might be a farewell moment





Whenever the Kansas City Chiefs take the field, one question somehow always pops up online before kickoff: Is Taylor Swift going to be there? With the Chiefs set to face the Raiders, fans are once again refreshing timelines, tracking private jets, and overanalyzing every rumor tied to Travis Kelce ’s biggest supporter. The matchup could mark the final NFL game of Travis Kelce’s 2025 season and possibly the end of his legendary career if he chooses to retire, making Swift’s potential attendance a bigger storyline than usual. So, what is confirmed and what’s just buzz? Here’s the latest.Here’s the important part: there is no official confirmation that Taylor Swift will be at the Chiefs-Raiders game. No statement has been made by her team, the Chiefs, or anyone directly connected to the situation. As of now, there have also been no verified sightings or confirmed reports from credible outlets saying she’s attending.Swift’s name has become a fixture in Chiefs coverage especially at Patriots and Chargers games where she’s appeared in the past and every time Travis Kelce takes the field, alternate timelines of fan speculation start trending. Now, because this Week 18 game may represent Kelce’s, fans online are especially keen to see Swift in the stands. The emotional backdrop is feeding more online theories and increased search traffic as kickoff approaches.The idea isn’t rooted in a confirmed schedule, it’s rooted in pattern recognition (Swift supports Kelce when she can) plus heightened stakes (a possible final game of his career). Rumors and fan theories are spreading on social platforms, with supporters imagining what it would mean for Swift to attend whatin his NFL journey.Even without the Taylor Swift factor, Chiefs vs. Raiders always draws attention. The rivalry brings extra intensity, and every late-season matchup carries weight for the Chiefs and their postseason momentum. Travis Kelce remains a focal point on offense, and his performances naturally keep him and his personal life in the spotlight.Whether or not Kelce retires this offseason, the emotional undertone around this game is palpable. It frames not just his potential final performance but why fans are curious about every detail including the possible presence of Swift.Also read - Hailee Steinfeld shares new pregnancy photos, shows baby bump and ‘Baby Beau’ onesie
Article Summary: Taylor swift is reportedly terriefied because of travis kelce. There is no official confirmation that taylor swift will be at the chiefs-raiders game. No statement has been made by her team, the chiefs, or anyone directly connected to the situation.

Article Title: Matt Kuchar’s net worth in 2025: How consistency turned a PGA Tour grinder into a multimillionaire
Article Text:
Matt Kuchar’s net worth in 2025: How consistency turned a PGA Tour grinder into a multimillionaire (Image Via Getty Images)

Matt Kuchar's net worth in 2025

Matt Kuchar's career highlights and earnings

Matt Kuchar's world ranking and recent updates

Matt Kuchar's endorsements, home, and charity work

Also Read:





Matt Kuchar is a well-known American golfer who has been playing on the PGA Tour for over 20 years. He is recognized for his tranquil personality, consistent game, and long ascension in the elite category. Kuchar has been making millions from prize money and sponsor deals throughout his career; thus, he is regarded as one of the most prosperous golfers of his era.The estimated net worth of Matt Kuchar as of March 2025 is $25 million. His winnings on the PGA Tour, along with the bonuses he received from the major tournaments and the long-term sponsorship contracts, are the factors that contributed to most of his fortune. Kuchar has been a consistent performer for many years, which has helped him earn a steady income even without frequent wins late in his career.Matt Kuchar was born on June 21, 1978, and turned professional in 2000. He won his first PGA Tour event at the Honda Classic in 2002. His best financial year came in 2010, when he topped the PGA Tour money list and won both the Vardon Trophy and the Byron Nelson Award.As of March 2025, Kuchar has won nine PGA Tour titles. His biggest wins include The Players Championship in 2012 and the WGC Match Play in 2013.Spotrac estimates that he has made around $67 million in total throughout his career, of which the largest payouts from a single event were The Players Championship ($1.7 million) and the WGC Match Play ($1.5 million).According to the Official World Golf Ranking (OWGR), Matt Kuchar was ranked No. 133 in March 2025. His career-best ranking was No. 4 in 2013. He also won a bronze medal at the 2016 Olympic Games while representing the United States.In recent seasons, Kuchar has played a limited schedule. There have been no major wins or injuries reported in 2025, and he continues to compete mainly as a veteran presence on tour.Kuchar has endorsement deals with Bridgestone Golf and Bettinardi Golf, confirmed through the brands’ official websites. He lives in St. Simons Island, Georgia, where he owns a large home purchased in 2010.He is also known for charity work. In 2015, he donated $25,000 to United Way after missing a charity shot at an NBA game. In 2020, he donated $52,000 to help PGA Tour caddies during the COVID-19 pandemic, using his Players Championship earnings.
Article Summary: Matt kuchar was born on june 21, 1978, and turned professional in 2000. He won his first pga tour event at the honda classic in 2002. His biggest wins include the players championship in 2012 and the wgc match play in 2013. He has endorsement deals with bridgestone golf and bettinardi golf.

From the WNBA stars’ contract details to their total earnings, here is everything you need to know about Wilson and Cunningham’s net worth as of 2025.The WNBA star A’ja Wilson’s net worth as of late 2025 is estimated at $4 million (per Celebrity Net Worth). Article Title: Mike Tomlin net worth in 2025: How much the Pittsburgh Steelers coach earns, NFL contracts, recent season and more
Article Text:
Mike Tomlin net worth in 2025: How much the Pittsburgh Steelers coach earns, NFL contracts, recent season and more (Image Via Getty)

How Mike Tomlin built his net worth in 2025

How Mike Tomlin’s Steelers contract pays him

Mike Tomlin Coaching career that built his wealth

Mike Tomlin recent season and job security in 2025





Mike Tomlin is one of the most respected coaches in the NFL. He has led the Pittsburgh Steelers since 2007 and has never had a losing season. That great run of success has also assisted him in developing significant personal wealth. Mostly from his coaching compensation and long-term contracts with the Steelers, Mike Tomlin is thought to be worth roughly $30 million in 2025.As of 2025, Mike Tomlin’s net worth is estimated to be about $30 million. Several trusted sports finance sites place his wealth in the $30–32 million range.The bulk of that money comes from his steady NFL coaching pay over nearly two decades. Unlike many coaches who move teams often, Tomlin has stayed in one place, which has helped him earn consistent and reliable income year after year.In June 2024, Mike Tomlin signed a three-year contract extension with the Steelers that runs through the 2027 season.Reports confirmed the deal is worth around $50 million, which puts his yearly salary at roughly $16–17 million per season. That makes him one of the highest-paid head coaches in the NFL.Before this deal, he had already signed a major extension in 2021, showing the team’s long-term trust in him.Mike Tomlin became the Steelers’ head coach in 2007, making him one of the youngest head coaches in league history at the time.He won Super Bowl XLIII in just his second season.Over his career, he has posted zero losing seasons, reached the playoffs multiple times, and earned a reputation for leadership and stability. That level of success is rare and has played a big role in his high earnings.During the 2024–25 season, the PittsburghSteelers remained competitive in a tough AFC North. While fans debated playoff chances late in the year, team leaders publicly backed Mike Tomlin.There have been no official signs the Pittsburgh Steelers plan to move on from him. With his contract locked in through 2027, Mike Tomlin remains one of the safest and most trusted coaches in the NFL, both on the field and financially.Also Read: Tom Brady Becomes The Highest-Paid Broadcaster Ever As Fox Sports Deal Tops Michael Strahan And Tony Romo
Article Summary: Mike tomlin is one of the most respected coaches in the nfl. He has led the pittsburgh steelers since 2007 and has never had a losing season. In june 2024, he signed a three-year contract extension with the steelers that runs through the 2027 season.

Article Title: Natalya Neidhart and Tyson Kidd combined net worth: WWE careers, bonuses, salaries, contracts, and overall earnings
Article Text:
Natalya Neidhart and Tyson Kidd (Image Source: Getty)

Natalya Neidhart’s WWE career and earnings growth

Tyson Kidd’s in-ring success and post-injury WWE role





Natalya Neidhart and Tyson Kidd were born into professional wrestling and WWE universe and have been established since they were 20 years old. Through WWE contracts, television showcases, and decades of steady employment instead of fleeting headlines, both built financial futures. Good record of relevancy, including expanding their combined net worth.Neither is among WWE's top 10 global superstars so far as compensation, at least on the finer points of the evening, but the dollars tell the tale of consistent success for each. Natalya is still appearing regularly, while Tyson Kidd moved into an important backstage position after suffering a career-ending injury. Combined, their earnings have been accumulated with salaries, achievement bonuses, merchandise royalties, and offstage duties not associated with actual wrestling.Natalya Neidhart has had one of the longest, uninterrupted runs in WWE's modern era women's division. Having first debuted on the main roster in the late 2000s, she quickly became a consistent presence on weekly television, premium live events, and overseas excursions. This consistency eventually progressed into an uptick in contract renewals and a small bump in pay every year.ID@undefinedCaption not available.ID@undefinedCaption not available.ID@undefinedCaption not available.The bulk of Natalya's income has traditionally come from a salary she is guaranteed to earn annually, bonuses related to major events, merchandise, and further exposure via WWE-related media. The association with the iconic Hart wrestling family only enhanced her brand value, allowing her to remain relevant throughout almost every era of women's wrestling. Her individual net worth has widely been estimated at around $2 million, a figure based on years of reliable earnings, not temporary highs.Tyson Kidd’s real-life identity is TJ Wilson. He started his career working as an in-ring performer, predominantly as a skilled singles male and tag team wrestler. However, a serious neck injury in 2015 saw his career take a drastic turn when he was forced to stop competing full-time.Instead of releasing him, WWE kept Kidd backstage in a producer and trainer role. It's a role that hardly anyone but hardcore fans will notice, but guarantees employment, stability, and permanence in a company. His continued role in planning matches and developing talent has helped him secure an ongoing source of income, which is reported at $3 million.Combined, Natalya Neidhart and husband Tyson Kidd have a net worth estimated at $5 million. That number represents two decades' worth of WWE contracts, bonuses, royalties, and near-constant employment. Their financial profile is linked to longevity, faith from management, and shifting roles within WWE, the opposite of top-tier superstars, most of whom work based on huge short-term contracts. Their overall wealth is expected to grow in the coming days.Also Read: What is really going on with WWE star Nikki Bella and NFL star Cooper DeJean’s dating buzz on Netflix?
Article Summary: Natalya neidhart and husband tyson kidd have a net worth estimated at $5 million. Their financial profile is linked to longevity, faith from management, and shifting roles within wwe. Their overall wealth is expected to grow in the coming days.

Article Title: “She feels exposed”: Taylor Swift reportedly shaken and uncomfortable by Travis Kelce’s controversial confession ahead of their wedding

Taylor Swift is reportedly scared of Travis Kelce's controversial past, ahead of their wedding

Taylor Swift and Travis Kelce have had a pretty hard time this season as the Kansas City Chiefs have recorded a pretty average performance on the field this time.With the season coming to an end now, Taylor Swift and Travis Kelce seem to be focused on their wedding. But there is something that is reportedly bothering the billionaire pop star.A few weeks ago, Travis Kelce had confessed on his popular podcast, New Heights, about the time he was suspended when he was caught with marijuana in college.ID@undefinedCaption not available.It seems Taylor Swift is really bothered by this confession. As per Radar Online, a source has revealed that, "Taylor hates that this has become a talking point again. She's spent years crafting a clean, family-friendly image, and she's terrified that something from Travis's past could smear that."A second source added, "She's incredibly proud of how hard he's worked to turn his life around – but this story coming back up makes her feel exposed.”The source continued, “Taylor's brand thrives on control and positivity, and this just isn't part of that narrative."However, neither Taylor Swift nor Travis Kelce has responded to these speculations as they continue to be tight lipped about their wedding.Travis Kelce has confessed that he had to go to a therapist after the marijuana incident in college.The popular tight end said, "I had to sit down with a shrink for an hour a week…”Travis Kelce added, "He got me to look at my life way more strategically. He got me to understand that you go through these emotions, and your reaction can either help you or hurt you or be indifferent."Despite the obstacles that Travis Kelce faced in his life, he has proven his worth on the field and is easily one of the highest paid players in the league.However, this season was a bit difficult for Travis Kelce as he got brutally trolled for his performance on the field.Travis Kelce is also speculated to opt for retirement at the end of this season but nothing has been confirmed yet.Also Read: Taylor Swift reportedly focused on "protecting" her relationship with Travis Kelce as she stepped back from spotlight during the season
Article Summary: Taylor swift is reportedly scared of travis kelce's controversial past, ahead of their wedding. Kelce confessed on his popular podcast, new heights, about the time he was suspended when he was caught with marijuana in college. Taylor swift's brand thrives on control and positivity, and this just isn't part of that narrative.

Article Title: Caitlin Clark names her favorite NFL player on New Heights amidst Super Bowl buzz
Article Text:
Caitlin Clark (Image via Getty)

Caitlin Clark is a huge Drake Maye fan



Caitlin Clark’s most-awaited recovery and return







With the Super Bowl almost a month away, everyone has their favorites, and so does WNBA’s biggest star, Caitlin Clark. On the recent episode of the “New Heights” podcast hosted by the Kelce brothers, Jason and Travis, the 2024 ROTY winner appeared and sparked a cross-sport debate after naming her favorites for Super Bowl 2026.Though Clark hails from Iowa, she admitted her admiration for the New England Patriots, which is largely influenced by her liking for Patriots star QB Drake Maye. This seemed like a classic case where greatness recognizes and appreciates greatness.The last episode of New Heights for 2025 was anything but not dramatic. In a conversation with Jason and Travis over who is Clark’s favorite to win the next Super Bowl, Caitlin revealed, “I may not be cheering for anybody…but honestly, I am a Drake Maye fan. He’s been incredible.Continuing, she said, “I will probably be pulling for the Patriots, but the Rams are really good too. Sam Darnold seems like a good guy…I could root for him.”Drake Maye and Caitlin Clark began their professional career in 2024 and have been proving to be a cornerstone for their teams. Draye Maye registered a completion rate of 66.6% completing 225-of-338 passes in 2024, over 2,276 yards, and 15 touchdowns.Clark also entered the 2025 season after a historic rookie campaign where she averaged 19.2 points and a league-leading 8.4 assists per game. Though her 2025 season ended early, just after 13 games, due to an injury, the snippets from the USA camp show Clark is healthier and ready to enter the 2026 season with a bang.While the Super Bowl occupies the current headline from who’ll play to who’ll perform at halftime, the Indy fever fans are more concerned with Clark’s physical longevity. Reports suggest her 100% recovery and her focus on strength training to return by the WNBA’s 2026 tip-off. Clark’s return is just not crucial for the Fever, whose offensive strength revolves around her, but also for the league as she’s a walking viewership magnet.In 2025, as per ESPN, across all the 24 post-season games, WNBA delivered its best ever viewership ratings with an average of 1.2 million viewers. The four-most-watched WNBA games of 2025 all featured Caitlin Clark and her team. Now, that is some serious digital power flex.Also read: Caitlin Clark and Connor McCaffery's combined net worth 2025: Exploring WNBA power couple’s career earnin
Article Summary: Caitlin clark is a huge drake maye fan. The 2024 roty winner appeared and sparked a cross-sport debate after naming her favorites for super bowl 2026. Reports suggest her 100% recovery and her focus on strength training to return by the wnba’s 2026 tip-off.

Article Title: LeBron James vs Stephen Curry net worth: Total earnings, salary, and more
Article Text:
LeBron James and Stephen Curry (Image via Getty)

LeBron James vs Stephen Curry salary breakdown

The net worth battle between LeBron James and Stephen Curry







LeBron James and Stephen Curry are the Mount Rushmore of modern NBA. They just do not dominate the court with their skills and game IQ, but make a significant impact off the court too. It is still wild to imagine how they both were born in the same hospital. Shocked much? As reported by the Beacon Journal in 2015, both James (1984) and Curry (1988) were born at Akron General Medical Center in Ohio, just a few years apart.These two heavyweights just don’t outshine their opponents on the court, but they also command the financial landscape of NBA. From battling for rings to sharing a bond of trust and respect, LeBron James and Stephen Curry have come a long way and so did their bank accounts. One is a certified billionaire business mogul, while the other is currently the highest-paid on-court performer the league has ever seen.If one just looks at the seasonal paycheck, then Stephen Curry is actually winning. For the 2025–26 season, Steph is pulling in a staggering $59.6 million from the Golden State Warriors, making him the highest-paid player in the league, a record that he has held since 2017-18. But LeBron James isn't exactly lagging, despite his Lakers salary for this season sitting at $52.6 million.The difference is Curry’s art of the "Supermax." He was the first player to cross the $200 million contract threshold when he signed a 5-year $201 million deal with the Warriors in 2017. And with his recent veteran extension of $62 million for 1-year, Curry’s on his way to becoming the first NBA player to be paid $62 million for a single season in 2026-27. However, while Steph wins the annual salary race, LeBron still leads in total career on-court earnings, having banked over $580 million since he was drafted back in 2003.This is where the comparison gets steep and the difference wide. LeBron James officially hit billionaire status in 2022 and currently sits at a net worth of approximately $1.3 billion. He didn't get there just by playing ball; he built an empire. Between his lifetime Nike deal (rumored to be worth over $1 billion), his production company SpringHill, and stakes in Fenway Sports Group (which owns the Red Sox and Liverpool FC), LeBron is playing a completely different game off the court.Stephen Curry’s current net worth is estimated at $240 million as of late 2025. While that’s a massive fortune, it shows the difference between being a superstar and being a tycoon. Steph’s wealth is climbing fast, though, thanks to his own Curry Brand, which is now independent after breaking with Under Armour and his Unanimous Media production house. At the end of the day, whether you prefer the King’s power or the Chef’s range, both are proving that the modern athlete is just as much a CEO as they are a point guard.Also read: "“We emptied the cups”: LeBron James and Bronny James get candid on LA Lakers’ Spill The Tea
Article Summary: Lebron james and stephen curry are the mount rushmore of modern nba. They just do not dominate the court with their skills and game iq, but make a significant impact off the court too. One is a certified billionaire business mogul, while the other is currently the highest-paid on-court performer the league has ever seen.

Article Title: 'If they release me': Mustafizur Rahim breaks silence after IPL release
Article Text:
Mustafizur Rahman. (PTI)

Mohammed Kaif breaks silence on Mustafizur Rahman–KKR debate

What BCB said





NEW DELHI: Bangladesh pacer Mustafizur Rahman has reacted to his release from the Indian Premier League (IPL) by the IPL franchise Kolkata Knight Riders (KKR).His reaction came before the Bangladesh Cricket Board (BCB) on Sunday resolved that the national team will not travel to India for the upcoming T20 World Cup. The decision was taken at a meeting held on Sunday afternoon.The matter was discussed against the backdrop of Mustafizur Rahman’s exclusion from the IPL. BCB directors had earlier met online on Saturday night to discuss the issue.At that stage, most directors were not in favour of taking any strict step. However, following intervention from the Bangladesh government, the board reviewed its position and changed its decision."The Board reviewed the situation in detail, taking into account developments over the last 24 hours and expressed deep concern over the overall circumstances surrounding the participation of the Bangladesh National Team in matches scheduled to be played in India," the BCB said in an official release."Following a thorough assessment of the prevailing situation and the growing concerns regarding the safety and security of the Bangladesh contingent in India and considering the advice from the Bangladesh Government, the Board of Directors resolved that the Bangladesh National Team will not travel to India for the tournament under the current conditions," the statement added.The BCB has also requested that Bangladesh’s T20 World Cup matches be moved out of India. "In light of this decision, the BCB has formally requested the International Cricket Council (ICC), as the event authority, to consider relocating all of Bangladesh’s matches to a venue outside India," the board said.The decision followed Mustafizur Rahman’s release by IPL franchise Kolkata Knight Riders (KKR) after instructions from the Board of Control for Cricket in India ( BCCI ), amid rising diplomatic tension between India and Bangladesh.Reacting to the development, Mustafizur said, "If they release me, there’s nothing much I can do," while speaking to BDCrictime.KKR had signed the 30-year-old left-arm pacer for Rs 9.20 crore at the players’ auction last month. His base price was Rs 2 crore, with Chennai Super Kings and Delhi Capitals also involved in the bidding.The BCCI said KKR will be allowed to name a replacement player if required for the tournament, which is scheduled to start on March 26.India and Sri Lanka are the joint hosts of the 2026 ICC Men’s T20 World Cup. As per the schedule released so far, Bangladesh are set to play West Indies in Kolkata on February 7, the opening day of the tournament.Bangladesh’s remaining three group-stage matches are also scheduled to be held in Kolkata and Mumbai.Earlier on Sunday, the BCB announced a 15-member squad for the World Cup, naming Liton Das as captain.
Article Summary: Bangladesh's national team will not travel to india for the upcoming t20 world cup. The decision was taken at a meeting held on sunday afternoon. It followed mustafizur rahman’s release by ipl franchise kolkata knight riders (kkr) the decision comes amid rising diplomatic tension between india and bangladesh.

Article Title: Third time is a charm! Sam Curran leads Desert Vipers to maiden ILT20 title
Article Text:
Desert Vipers defeated MI Emirates by 46 runs to win ILT20 season 4 (ILT20)

Dubai:

Naseem Shah interview: Pakistan bowler opens up on bouts with injuries and tough recovery

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

Desert Vipers team celebrate after winning the title (ILT20)

Sam Curran of Desert Vipers raises his bat after scoring a fifty during the final of the DP World International League T20 between Desert Vipers and MI Emirates at the Dubai International Cricket Stadium, Dubai, United Arab Emirates, on 4 January 2026. (ILT20)

Sam Curran plays a shot in the final. (ILT20)

Desert Vipers players celebrates the wicket of Tom Banton of MI Emirates during the final of the DP World International League T20 between Desert Vipers and MI Emirates at the Dubai International Cricket Stadium, Dubai, United Arab Emirates, on 4 January 2026. (ILT20)

Poll Which player do you think was pivotal in the Desert Vipers' final victory? Sam Curran Jason Holder David Payne Usman Tariq

Brief Scores

Desert Vipers:

MI Emirates:





Third time's a charm. Third time lucky. These are two popular sayings in the English language. It's as if the first two attempts were stumbling blocks, they were launchpads for something that was inevitable. For Desert Vipers, that was the ILT20 title on Sunday at the Dubai Cricket Stadium. Desert Vipers defeated MI Emirates (MIE) by 46 runs in a one-sided final in Dubai.They had been here, under the Ring of Fire, twice and tasted defeated both times.This time, it felt different. Desert Vipers were cut above the rest all season. The Vipers scarcely put a foot wrong, losing just two of their ten matches. Vipers asserted their dominance over MI Emirates twice in in the knockouts, cruising to a 45-run win in Qualifier 1 before outclassing them yet again in the final.When they met MIE once again in the final, they were contesting against not just a team that has triumphed in every T20 league across the world, they were facing a side that was led by a perennial champion in the form of Kieron Pollard The early signs were that things would go away from the Vipers' grasp again.Toss came out in favour of MI Emirates and they chose to field on a surface that has seen the team batting second triumph more often than the first.Andries Gous, the wicketkeeper-batter, who had scored an unbeaten 120 against MIE in the Qualifier, was out with a calf injury.Teams had on an average scored 154.66 runs when batting first at this venue this season. Dubai Capitals had produced the biggest total - 186 against the Abu Dhabi Knight Riders - and gone on to win by 83 runs.Clearly, score big and put things beyond MIE would have been the mantra for the Sam Curran-led Desert Vipers.Three boundaries in four balls in the third over showed that intent from Fakhar Zaman and Jason Roy in the third over. But a few balls later, both perished in the gap of four balls, falling to Fazalhaq Farooqi, and it brought out England's Sam Curran to the middle.Curran, who had seen the team fall short last season, had picked up the leadership duties from Lockie Ferguson. Pollard spoke about Curran's leadership in the chat before the final.“I was reading somewhere about Sam’s leadership, and that he is unbeaten as captain,” Pollard said. “Everything is leaning in his favour, which is a good thing – not just for Sam, but for future reference.”Individually, Curran had been a top performer for his side. Having scored 323 runs from 11 matches, he needed to deliver in this pressure moment, with two wickets falling in quick succession.He took his time to get going. In the first five balls, he failed to get off the mark. And once he did, he blazed four consecutive boundaries. And then there was another lull. He went 13 balls without hitting a boundary, including six dot balls. Then came another four. In the next spell of 21 balls, he hit further three boundaries. Evidently, the objective was to bide time on the low-scoring track.Romario Shepherd's errant deliveries - one full and wide, the other short on middle and off - allowed Curran to relax his arms and tonk two maximums.By the end of it all, Curran remained unbeaten on 74 from 51 balls - it wasn't a gun blazing knock by any stretch of the imagination but it had done the job for the team. From reeling at 36 for 2 in the fourth over, they had reached 182m for 4, helped in part by MIE bowling 11 wides or nearly two more overs.When he got the ball, Curran was smashed for 24 runs from two overs but his teammates had done the job for him. David Payne took 3 for 42, Naseem Shah picked 3 for 18 and Usman Tariq's tricky bowling action and variety fetched him 2 for 20.Maybe this third time lucky, third time's the charm was meant to be. MIE were chasing on the night for a sixth match in a row and had won four times. Both of the two defeats during this run came against Vipers.Curran, deservedly, will take in the applause. As the last wicket fell, he raised his hands, clapped multiple times before embracing his team as the Player of the Match, winner of the Green Belt and Red Belt for second year running.182 for 4 in 20 overs (Sam Curran 74 not out, Jason Holder 41; Fazallaq Farooqi 2/33)136 all out in 18.3 overs (Shakib Al Hasan 36; Naseem Shah 3/18, David Payne 3/42)
Article Summary: Desert vipers defeated mi emirates by 46 runs to win ilt20 season 4. England's sam curran scored a fifty in the final. The vipers had lost just two of their ten matches this season. Sam curran hit 74 from 51 balls as mie reached 182m for 4 in 20 overs. David payne took 3 for 42, naseem shah picked 3 for 18 and usman tariq 2 for 20.

Article Title: From Mumbai to Chennai: Before KKR, which five IPL teams showed faith in Mustafizur Rahman? Check full list
Article Text:
Mustafizur Rahman (IPL Photo)

Mohammed Kaif breaks silence on Mustafizur Rahman–KKR debate





NEW DELHI: Bangladesh's Mustafizur Rahman has found himself in the spotlight again. On Saturday, the left-arm pacer was released by the Indian Premier League ( IPL ) franchise Kolkata Knight Riders (KKR), following a directive from the BCCI.The decision triggered a strong reaction back home, with the Bangladesh Cricket Board on Sunday announcing that the national team would not travel to India for the upcoming T20 World Cup due to security concerns.While the episode has added a political layer to the story, Mustafizur’s IPL journey extends far beyond the current controversy.Before his brief association with KKR, five IPL franchises had shown faith in the Bangladeshi pacer over the years.Mustafizur made his IPL debut in 2016 with Sunrisers Hyderabad. It turned out to be a breakthrough season.He picked up 17 wickets in 16 matches, conceding runs at an impressive economy of 6.90. His cutters and change of pace made him a key weapon, especially at the death.He returned to SRH in 2017 but featured in just one match due to fitness issues, team balance, and national team commitments.In 2018, Mumbai Indians brought him in, where he played seven games and took seven wickets.Rajasthan Royals signed him in 2021, and Mustafizur delivered another steady season.He claimed 14 wickets in 14 matches, proving his value as a reliable overseas bowler.Delhi Capitals then picked him for multiple seasons.Between 2022 and 2025, he played for DC in three different editions, having taken 13 wickets across 13 matches.His best season with Delhi came in 2025, where he picked up four wickets in just three matches at an economy of 7.90.In 2024, Chennai Super Kings trusted him with a bigger role. Mustafizur responded by taking 14 wickets in nine matches, including a four-wicket haul.Mustafizur has played 60 IPL matches across five teams, taking 65 wickets at an average of 28.44 and a strike rate of 20.9. His best figures remain 4 for 29.KKR had bought him for Rs 9.20 crore after a bidding war at the Abu Dhabi auction. However, following the BCCI’s diktat, the Shah Rukh Khan co-owned franchise released him.While the BCCI did not directly link the move to political tensions, it stated that the decision was driven by “what’s been happening all around”.
Article Summary: Bangladesh's mustafizur rahman released by kolkata knight riders (kkr) decision triggered a strong reaction back home, with the bangladesh cricket board announcing that the national team would not travel to india for the upcoming t20 world cup due to security concerns.

Article Title: 'A miracle': Damien Martyn wakes from coma after meningitis scare, Adam Gilchrist confirms he can talk
Article Text:
Damien Martyn (Image credit: Instagram)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

India ODI squad review | Iyer returns, Pant gets the nod, Shami misses out again

Poll Should more awareness be raised about meningitis and its risks? Yes, definitely Maybe No, it's well-known





Former Australian cricketer Damien Martyn has emerged from an induced coma following a serious bout of meningitis, with former teammate and close friend Adam Gilchrist describing the turnaround as nothing short of “a miracle”.The 54-year-old former batter, who played 67 Tests and 208 one-day internationals for Australia, fell critically ill late last month and was rushed to hospital on the Gold Coast, where he was diagnosed with meningitis — a potentially life-threatening inflammation of the membranes surrounding the brain and spinal cord.Gilchrist confirmed on Sunday that Martyn has now woken from the coma and is responding strongly to treatment.“It’s been an unbelievable turn of events in the last 48 hours,” Gilchrist said. “He is now able to talk and respond to treatment. He has responded extraordinarily well since coming out of the coma to the point where his family feels it’s like some sort of miracle.”According to Gilchrist, Martyn’s condition has improved so rapidly that doctors are hopeful he can soon be moved out of the intensive care unit at Gold Coast University Hospital.“It has been so positive that they’re hopeful he will be able to move out of the ICU into another part of the hospital, which is representative of what a great recovery it’s been and how quickly it has flipped around,” he said. “He’s in good spirits and overwhelmed by the support. There is still some treatment and monitoring to go, but it’s looking positive.”Gilchrist also shared a message from Martyn’s wife Amanda, crediting the outpouring of support from across the cricketing world for aiding his recovery. “She really wants to say to everyone that she is convinced the love, goodwill and sense of care — through messages and media coverage — really helped him,” he said.Born in Darwin, Martyn made his Test debut at 21 during the 1992–93 series against the West Indies. Renowned as one of the game’s finest strokemakers, he became a key figure in Steve Waugh ’s dominant Australian side, scoring 13 Test centuries at an average of 46.37.He was part of Australia’s World Cup-winning teams in 1999 and 2003. Martyn retired during the 2006–07 Ashes series and has largely stayed out of the public eye since.
Article Summary: Former australian cricketer damien martyn has emerged from an induced coma following a serious bout of meningitis. The 54-year-old former batter, who played 67 tests and 208 one-day internationals for australia, fell critically ill late last month. Former teammate and close friend adam gilchrist described the turnaround as nothing short of "a miracle"

Article Title: Ashes: Joe Root slams 41st Test century, equals Ricky Ponting's record
Article Text:
Joe Root (Getty Images)

Jay Shah’s 2036 Olympic blueprint for India: '8 Medals won’t cut it'

Most Test hundreds



Multiple hundreds in an away Ashes series for England since 1994/95



Most Test hundreds since 2021







England’s batting mainstay Joe Root struck his second century of the Ashes series on Monday, taking his overall tally to 41 Test hundreds and drawing level with Australian great Ricky Ponting in third place on the all-time list. The prolific right-hander reached the landmark with a couple off Michael Neser during a composed innings in the fifth and final Test against Australia in Sydney.The 35-year-old, who sits second on the all-time Test run-scorers’ list behind only India legend Sachin Tendulkar , smashed 11 fours in his 146-ball knock. Root’s masterclass guided England to 272 for 5 midway through the morning session on day two, having resumed the day on 72.It was his second hundred of the series and his first with the red ball, following a sublime unbeaten 138 in the day-night Test in Brisbane that ended a long wait for a century in Australia after three previous Ashes tours.Root’s latest feat puts him alongside Ponting on the all-time list of Test centuries, with only Tendulkar (51) and South Africa’s Jacques Kallis (45) ahead of him. Making his Test debut in 2012, Root is featuring in his 163rd Test.51 - Sachin Tendulkar45 - Jacques Kallis41 - Ricky Ponting41 - Joe Root38 - Kumar Sangakkara3 - Michael Vaughan in 2002/033 - Alastair Cook in 2010/112 - Jonathan Trott in 2010/112 - Joe Root in 2025/2624 - Joe Root10 - Steven Smith10 - Kane Williamson10 - Harry Brook10 - Shubman Gill
Article Summary: Joe root hits second century of ashes series against australia. 35-year-old reaches landmark with a couple off michael neser in sydney. England batsman now has 41 test hundreds, level with ricky ponting. Sachin tendulkar (51) and jacques kallis (45) are ahead of root on all-time list.
